oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General sequential quantum cloning
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dang, Gui-Fang
Fan, Heng
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Some multipartite quantum states can be generated in a sequential manner which may be implemented by various physical setups like microwave and optical cavity QED, trapped ions, and quantum dots etc. We analyze the general N to M qubits Universal Quantum Cloning Machine (UQCM) within a sequential generation scheme. We show that the N to M sequential UQCM is available. The case of d-level quantum states sequential cloning is also presented.
